trends: There have been no other sightings in Inwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside around 11pm, smoking, and just happened to look up into the sky. I saw an orange triangle, best described as shaped like a typical paper airplane, with flames shooting out of the back. It was just above the tree line. I watched it for maybe 5 seconds as it was travelling very fast. It disappeared behind a tree and I waited for it to emerge on the other side, where it did not. I did not see it again after that. About 10 seconds following this siting, in the horizon - which was dark and a very clear sky, I saw two light flashes, one after the other. I became somewhat spooked as I was home alone with my young baby so I went back inside, puzzled and wondering if I had just seen a UFO. I believe I did. Thanks for letting me share my experience.
Summary: Orange glowing triangle with flames as emissions shooting through air and disappearing
